1610193120_1KkgEcvzK3mbVZGBTFLgkwy7WDjdf.body:
Into the Darkness by Lothrop Stoddard is good to actually have insight into what Nazi Germany was like. Mein Kampf, you should get the Dalton translation as the bigger books come with the German translation for personal review-ability. I don't know any other version that does that. Dalton's writing also breaks things up a bit so it's a little easier to digest.

I also suggest https://national-justice.com and the https://nationaljusticeparty.com for current happenings.
